text: Beverly Marsh ’ s hair is winter fire, January embers. Jessica Chastain ’ s heart burns there, too. Maybe. The Zero Dark Thirty actress is in talks to join the sequel to Stephen King ’ s It, playing the adult version of the flame - haired character who inspired that secret admirer ’ s poem, EW has confirmed. Ever since New Line announced that King ’ s epic 1986 novel would be split into two parts, it has been obvious to most people, including director Andy Muschietti, that Chastain would be perfect to play the grown - up Bev, who returns to the town of Derry with her fellow Losers nearly 27 years later to face the evil, shapeless presence they defeated as children.
